snippet.title: Bot Colony Review (EA) - Is it Worth a Buy?
snippet.description:
It’s 2021, and a devious spy has infiltrated the Pacific sanctuary of the Nakagawa robot company. This secret agent has re-programmed the island’s robots to carry out a terrifying scheme. With only three days left before Armageddon, your help is needed to root out the spy and save Bot Colony. - But is it Worth a Buy?
